title: Why are so many workers going on strike?
description: From posties to paramedics, the list of professions taking industrial action seems to keep growing. But will it lead to better working conditions – or just bring the UK to a standstill?. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Why are so many workers going on strike?
creator: The Guardian
